achievements.name: Test Automation coverage
description: Dialpad web automation coverage increased by 3% (39 to 42) including partially automated cases.
We have automated 3 additional Zoho test cases (The total number of Zoho cases are 26, We are executing them as part of the weekly regression).
We have automated 10 MS Dynamics test cases and 1 Copper test case.

achievements.name: New initiatives
achievements.description: Test execution time reduction - UI + API integrations - Work In Progress

achievements.name: ZTP Automation
achievements.description: Implemented logic to run on Stable Chrome or Canary Chrome. Now this execution is hassle-free, so by passing parameters, we can execute in stable Chrome or Canary Chrome.
